column20: Charged Attack: Shoots gems that deal Geo DMG. Upon hit, this grants Ningguang 1 Star Jade.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of stamina to fire off a giant gem that deals Geo DMG. If Ningguang has any Star Jades, unleashing a Charged Attack will cause the Star Jades to be fired at the enemy as well, dealing additional DMG.
column119: Jade Screen: Ningguang creates a Jade Screen out of gold, obsidian and her great opulence, dealing AoE Geo DMG.
column217: Backup Plan: When Ningguang is in possession of Star Jades, her Charged Attack does not consume Stamina.
column218: Strategic Reserve: A character that passes through the Jade Screen will gain a 12% Geo DMG Bonus for 10s.
column219: Piercing Fragments: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.
column220: Shock Effect: When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset. Can occur once every 6s.
column221: Majesty be the Array of Stars: Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column222: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.
column223: Invincible be the Jade Screen: Increases the Level of Jade Screen by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column224: Grandeur be the Seven Stars: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.
